resume.name: Dewey Nguyen
resume.summary: An experienced software engineer with proven track record in software development and advanced Object Oriented Techniques looks to develop skills in developing complex robust software systems in a team driven environment.

mainitem.desc: SIRCA is a provider of financial research data for various end users e.g. trading firms. SIRCA's Thomson Reuters Tick History (TRTH) project is large scale commercial software aimed at hedge funds. It is the world biggest database with continuous data extraction, processing and meta tagging.
mainitem.subitem: High volume tick data processing using C++ daemons - using dedicated high spec. Linux enterprise servers – over 140Gb of compressed data daily.
Upgrade of C++ daemons, diagnosing and fixing bugs.
Big Data extraction using C++ on the grid: over 300 trading exchanges daily, and client requests on the grid.
Data extraction using C++ pipe and filter engine with configurable capability.
Interfacing coding for large MySQL databases – up to 1TB - by using C++, Perl and MySQL command line. Database schema and data migration using mentioned languages.
Creation, upgrade, feature adding to Perl daemons, Linux scripts.
Software packaging in Linux and build scripts.
Writing Ruby, C++ unit and system tests.
Client support in web front-end and API usage – roster rotation responsibility.
24/7 emergency on-call system support in case of system failures – roster rotation responsibility.
QA and Infrastructure support, software release support during software release sprint.

Technologies: C++, Perl, Shell scripting, Ruby and Java languages. CentOS Linux servers, Apache web servers & Tomcat, XMLRPC networking, Linux RPMs, Bamboo (continuous build), Crucible (code review tool) and Subversion code control.

mainitem.desc: Software R&D project (team based) for new business opportunity.
mainitem.subitem: Research possible architecture for the project.

mainitem.desc: Domain Specific Language (DSL) - .NET 3.5:
Windows Presentation Foundation GUI (WPF) - .NET 3.5:
Research and integration of open source software that uses C# .NET 3.5 and XAML.
Composite Application Block (CAB & MEF).
Windows Workflow Foundation.
Thales sonar system project team member (development).
Object-Oriented system model design and implementation.
Development of complex C++ MFC Graphical User Interface.
Developing Re-Usable GUI library using OO Design using abstraction programming.
OpenGL with MFC GUI display - OpenGL Object Picking & DisplayList.
STL/Boost: Standard Template Library.
Native C++ development with Visual C++ 6.
Relational Database (Access) & SQL.
Development a software R&D project (team based) for existing telecommunication software system.
Native C++ and managed C++ .NET development with the Windows 2003 Server environment.
TCP/IP & UDP/IP.
.NET 1.1 - XML processing.
Software Lifecycle Development Process (Design Document & Test Plan).
XML communication development
Database (Access) & SQL.
Multi-Threaded application.

mainskill.desc: High Level Object Oriented Design and Development Skill.

mainskill.subskill: Architectural patterns: Layers, Component and Connector, Model View Controller (MVC).
Design Patterns - using polymorphism (eg. Gammel patterns).

mainskill.desc: Source code control: IBM Clearcase & Clearquest, Subversions, Git.
SQL, Relational Database - Designing relational database and SQL usage.
Skilled in C++, Perl, Bash scripting - 4+ years.
Other programming languages I had some experience with:
GUI Programming: MFC & JavaScript Dojo UI.
Operating Systems: Windows 2000/XP, Ubuntu, Linux Enterprise servers.
Visual Studio 2008/2003 IDE & Visual C++ 6, Eclipse, Sublime2, Vim.
XML, HTML, XSLT (eg. this resume web page).
